title: Flight Simulator 2020  - How to - Find SID's and STARs using Little Navmap
description:
In this how to we are going to look at how you can find SID's and STAR's using Little Navmap. Keep in mind you need to have version 2.6.13 or above of Little Navmap installed to have this ability. Prior to this version Little Navmap was using the NaviGraph database for this purpose which was not 100% accurate when planning flights for MSFS 2020.

Little Navmap can be downloaded from this site: https://www.littlenavmap.org/

The aircraft performance files referred to in the video can be downloaded from this site:
https://www.littlenavmap.org/downloads/Aircraft%20Performance/MSFS/
